tool_description: Gathers and structures evidence records from account activity, transactions, and communications for violation cases.

account_id.description: Account identifier to collect evidence for

evidence_types.description: Types of evidence to collect: transactions, messages, login_logs, purchases, reviews

start_date.description: Start date for evidence collection period

end_date.description: End date for evidence collection period

max_records.description: Maximum number of evidence records to collect

error_messages: Invalid date range: start_date must be before end_date and both must be valid ISO 8601 dates.
Unsupported evidence type: Use supported types [transactions, messages, login_logs, purchases, reviews, reports].
Date range too broad: Limit evidence collection to maximum 2 years to avoid timeouts.
Insufficient permissions: Cannot access requested evidence types for this account.
usage: Specify account_id, evidence_types array, and date range; optionally limit results with max_records to manage output size.

evidence_count.description: Total number of evidence items collected

key_findings.description: Summary of most significant evidence items
